pattpack.expr_extr
Interface Variable

All Superinterfaces:
Expr
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleVar, VarWithLine
public interface Variable
extends Expr

This interface is a Marker. It allows to extend the functionality of Variables from the previous exercise (e.g., from simple variables to variables that know their line number) without editing all the statement classes.

Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from interface pattpack.expr_extr.Expr
